meanings.sent1: The adynamic kitten could barely climb the small steps.
meanings.sent2: She felt adynamic after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The adynamic squirrel tried to gather nuts but kept falling asleep.
meanings.sent4: His adynamic phone battery died just when he needed it most.
meanings.sent5: The adynamic candle flickered weakly in the dark room.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a lack of power or vitality
meanings.sent1: The adynamic plant wilted under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The adynamic engine sputtered and stalled on the highway.
meanings.sent3: The adynamic party had no music or laughter, just awkward silence.
meanings.sent4: Her adynamic imagination struggled to come up with creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The adynamic river barely trickled through the dry landscape.
